title: Matter continuously cycles through an ecosystem 2

content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Matter continuously cycles through an ecosystem. A simplified carbon cycle is depicted below.
content.question: Identify an organism that carries out both processes.

frqParts.text: Identify an organism that carries out both processes.
